house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1940 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) and approximately 2228 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room. Features include view, fireplace, air conditioning, satellite dish.
house_listing.firm_name: Miami Shores Realt Miami Shores Realt Lic. Real Estate Broker
